summary:
Adds a new floating Island, just overlapping Whiterun.
Click here to find out more about Drijvend! :D
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34664-1-1365718069.jpg[/img]

[size=14pt][b][color=#33ccff]Just Completed Beta Version 1.3![/b][/color][/size]
[b][color=#EE1289]If you like it, Endorse it! I\'ve spent over 2 Months planning, creating and assessing on how I will complete Drijvend, thats just over 70 days! It would mean so much to me if you guys downloaded, recommend and and also endorse this mod for me. Thank you!
Don\'t forget to Credit NordRaider88 for the nav-meshing. Thanks again![/b][/color]

[line]

[url=http://translate.google.co.uk/#auto/en/Drijvend]If your stuck on the Pronunciation of Drijvend Click Here[/url], We came up with: Drijvend while looking for a name for the Island, we wanted something very... Skyrim-Like, so we opened up google translate and tried a lot of different words like: Flying, Island, Floating, Hovering, City and Town. We came to the conclusion of translating: Floating from English to Dutch. The outcome: Drijvend.

[heading][b][color=#FF0000]*READ ME!*[/color][/heading] - This mod is still in a Beta, more will be added soon.[/b]

I have plans for expansion for this mod, keep updated on my files section here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5023937/#]My Nexus Files[/url]

[heading][b][color=#FF0000]Description -[/color][/b][/heading]
Adds an Island just above Whitrun, there are no houses as of yet but there will be, within the island there is a forest area with small mountains and hotsprings too. There is a teleporter outside of whiteruns gate, but there is also a map marker for the island too if you find this more convenient. Here\'s a quick preview:

[heading][b][color=#FF0000]Requirements -[/color][/b][/heading]
For the armor to look good, please install:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]

For more Information on the Armor, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846//?]Click Here[/url]

Recommendations from the Armor Creator: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27463/?]TERA Weapons Collection for Skyrim[/url]

There shouldn\'t be any other mods that require this mod to work, but make sure you\'ve got the Update.esm ticked. But you could also install Texture packs to make it look better than the vanilla colours/appearance.

Here\'s what I\'d suggest:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/url], A massive graphics overhaul for Skyrim. Makes it look absolutely Fantastic. :D Or if you can\'t Run the 2K textures use this instead: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7583//?]Sexy Villages and Towns[/url].

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/711]Realistic Water Textures and Terrain[/url], Making all of the waterfalls and rock look pretty! Download this, its quite a big retexture but you should be fine if you can run skyrim at a good 30Fps, it also makes the Water look rather pretty.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8058]Open Cities Skyrim[/url], This mod make the mod so much better, rather than using the teleporter (which uses a loading screen to get back to Whiterun) then using the Whiterun gate, why don\'t you just jump off the island and land straight in Whiterun? :D And You can also see Drijvend fully while in the cities rather than look at a ugly pattern. (MY RECOMMENDATION).

[heading][b][color=#FF0000]Current Issues -[/color][/b][/heading]
Some Clipping and Hollow Items

[heading][b][color=#FF0000]Questions that I guess will be asked (FAQ) -[/color][/b][/heading]

[b]Will this be uploaded to the Steam Workshop?[/b]
[color=#FF0000] - No, unless there\'s a big need for it.[/color]

[b]When will this be updated?[/b]
[color=#FF0000] - When It\'s ready.[/color]

[b]Can anyone edit it?[/b]
[color=#FF0000] - No.[/color]

[heading][b][color=#FF0000]Permissions -[/color][/b][/heading]
[b]All Instances of Editing, Re-uploading are strictly stated here that you must not edit this file till I give the go. Please track my file to keep up to date with it.[/b]

If you need to contact me in anyway please use any of these links:

[color=#FF0000][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5023937/]Nexus Profile[/url]
[url=www.youtube.com/user/RatedRPGames]Youtube Channel[/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/RatedRPGames]Twitter Page[/url]
[url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Ratedrpgames/157829814376181]Facebook Page[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/R-RPG]Steam Group Page[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/iLeeum/]My Personal Steam Page[/url][/color]

[heading][b][color=#FF0000]Section of Progress -[/color][/b][/heading]
- Completed Terrain, will keep revising for any errors/bugs
- Completed Mini Treasure Hunt
- Completed Lighting, will keep revising for any errors/bugs
- Completed Mod
- Finished the Line of Events
- Completed Housing and Storage
- Completed Nav Meshing
Pretty much done. Just fixing any issues that arise now.

[heading][b][color=#FF0000]Credits -[/color][/b][/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5023937/?]Leeum1995[/url] - Main Designer, Creator.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5628443/?]NordRaider88[/url] - Nav Mesher.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2113195/?]asianboy345[/url] - for Tera imported Armor.
[b][color=#FF0000]- I will add here if anybody else is needed -[/color][/b]
